mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.user_email, f.user_name, t.status_value as user_status_value, s.created_at from staffs s join users u on s.user_id = u.user_id join user_info f on s.user_id = f.user_id join user_status t on t.USER_STATUS_ID = u.USER_STATUS where store_id = #{store_id} and t.STATUS_VALUE not like '%in%'
